name: managerX
summary: How are you? I am a dark web developer specializing in network security, Python, Java, JavaScript, Kotlin, HTML, CSS, AI, Kali Linux. Over the years, I have learned and chosen the hard way for those young people who are unfortunately doing things that are not right for them. I provide a good environment for everyone.

experience.title: PhD in Software Development and IT Security, MSc in Social Engineering
achievements: Led technical strategy and development of Afghanistan's largest job platform, increasing daily active users by 300% and reaching over 50,000+ monthly users within the first year.
Built scalable web architecture using Django, PostgreSQL, Docker, and Nginx, capable of handling over 10,000 concurrent sessions with <300ms average response time.
Integrated multilingual support (Dari, Pashto, English) and secure authentication (JWT, email/phone), reducing failed login attempts by 45% and improving user accessibility across 34 provinces.
Managed a cross-functional team of 8+ developers (backend, frontend, mobile), improving sprint velocity by 60% through structured Agile workflows and weekly stand-ups.
Championed performance, security, and UX improvements, resulting in a 40% decrease in bounce rate and a 98% uptime SLA over 12 months.
Instituted robust CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker Compose, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to under 10 minutes, and enabling weekly production releases without downtime.

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
achievements: Architected and deployed over 10 full-featured web applications leveraging Django, Golang (Gin/Echo), HTMX, and TailwindCSS to deliver real-time interactivity and responsive user experiences.
Designed and launched an ebook downloading and sharing platform for university students with Django, attracting 1,000+ active users and facilitating over 10,000 downloads in the first academic year.

Engineered and maintained multiple Telegram bots with asynchronous task execution, database integration (SQLite/PostgreSQL), and modular architectureâ€”reducing maintenance overhead by 40% while enhancing scalability.
Enhanced platform performance and reliability, achieving <200ms average response times and 99.9% uptime through backend optimization and advanced caching mechanisms.

Refactored and modernized legacy web systems by decoupling front-end and back-end layers, implementing RESTful APIs, and significantly improving modularity and maintainability across diverse client projects.

Integrated robust authentication and authorization workflows utilizing OAuth2 and JWT, strengthening data security and enabling seamless user account management across multiple deployed web applications.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Designed and developed a Django-based Course Management System to manage physical course schedules, student enrollments, and tuition payments, supporting over 150+ active students.
Built a modular backend using Django's class-based views and forms, reducing code redundancy by 40% and accelerating feature expansion.
Integrated HTMX-driven partial page rendering, decreasing average admin task completion time by 30%.
Implemented role-based access control for administrators and staff, strengthening system security and reducing unauthorized access incidents to zero.
Deployed a responsive UI using AdminLTE, increasing accessibility across devices and improving staff satisfaction score by 25% (based on internal feedback).
Configured automated testing pipelines with Pytest and GitHub Actions, achieving 95% test coverage and enabling consistent CI across development cycles.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Developed a custom Django-based e-library platform to provide digital access to academic books and resources for students and faculty.
Implemented secure upload, categorization, and download functionality for PDF materials, resulting in 5,000+ downloads in the first semester.
Designed a user-friendly interface with advanced search and filtering, improving resource discovery efficiency by 40%.
Integrated an admin dashboard for librarians to manage content, authors, and categories, streamlining content curation and reducing manual workload.
Deployed the platform to a production VPS using Gunicorn and Nginx, maintaining 99.9% uptime during peak academic usage.
Constructed RESTful APIs to support future integration with academic and library management systems, enhancing long-term interoperability.

experience.title: Software Developer
achievements: Developed a comprehensive business management system for Nikpa Travel using Django and PostgreSQL, supporting 3,000+ customer profiles and increasing lead conversion rates by 35% through automated CRM workflows.
Built automated workflows for booking confirmations, visa follow-ups, and document reminders, reducing manual communication tasks by 60% and cutting response times from 24 hours to under 2 hours.
Integrated end-to-end financial tools including payment tracking, automated invoice generation, and real-time reporting, improving billing accuracy by 95% and reducing reconciliation time by 50%.
Implemented role-based access control (RBAC) and secure authentication for 50+ staff members, reducing unauthorized access incidents to zero over 12 months and enhancing audit compliance.

Delivered a responsive web interface using TailwindCSS and HTMX, boosting desk agent productivity by 40%, and streamlined deployment via CI/CD pipelines with unit testing, achieving 99.8% system uptime and enabling weekly release cycles.
